about_the_game:
This is a highly immersive role-playing game set in the martial arts world, and the existence of this world is shaped by you. Here, you can experience classic storylines from famous martial arts novels, and enjoy a variety of entertaining gameplay systems, whether it's the thrilling life of martial arts or the leisurely farming life – the choice is yours.

In the martial world, bonds between people are inseparable, and stories collide with one another. The game features hundreds of NPCs, each with their own stories waiting for you to discover and explore. As you, still green behind the ears, step into this world, what kind of stories await you? Can you feel a sense of belonging in this martial world? This is the story of Little Shrimp.

[Game Features]

The martial world is full of mysteries, with intense battles and numerous sects. The game gathers various classic martial arts techniques from famous novels, covering both internal and external skills. The combination of martial arts, tactics, and the synergy between martial arts and heroes requires strategic thinking. Why not showcase your skills and demonstrate your superior martial arts strategy, young hero?

[Chosen Ones, Embrace the Gifts]

Every hero who arrives here is chosen by fate. However, Little Shrimp martial world doesn't follow the usual path. The chosen ones are entitled to generous gifts. Accept this VIP10 and a heap of gold and silver treasures on your journey. There are even more treasures waiting for you to explore and unearth along the way.

[Humorous Martial World, Fun Everywhere]

Little Shrimp martial world not only recreates classic scenes from famous martial arts novels but also adds its own unique flavor. Don't miss any corner of the martial world, as it is filled with surprises and hidden Easter eggs. While wandering through the martial world, you might unexpectedly encounter flower-picking bandits, money-robbing villains, or witness a fierce battle between two tigers. What choices will you make as a young hero? Will you fuel the chaos, rescue those in danger, or stand by and watch? Who said there's only one choice, after all, life is about having fun!

[Six Years of Crafting, Masterpiece of Ingenuity]

Six years in the making, this game boasts a mature and comprehensive system. The game's features are diverse and well-developed, ensuring that monotony and predictability have no place in the game. The retro art style, coupled with martial arts-themed background music, and a variety of gameplay modes – once you dive in, it's hard to pull yourself out.

[Martial Arts Mastery, Intelligence and Valor]

Come and experience the mysteries of martial arts, which involve not only physical but also mental challenges. The choice of formations, the pairing of heroes, the influence of secret techniques, and the timing of skill releases – all require a sharp mind. Engage in exhilarating sparring sessions with other martial artists in the martial arts competition. The stage is set, waiting for you, young heroes, to showcase your skills.

[Entertaining Gameplay, Free Exploration]

Practices, adventures, dual cultivation, and inheritance – the martial world is full of stories waiting to be uncovered. Sect conflicts, gang invasions, and the pursuit of villains paint a colorful picture of life in the game. Sometimes, stepping away from the conflicts, cultivating fields, running a tavern, or leveling up through AFK activities allows for a relaxed and enjoyable experience.

May your journey in Little Shrimp martial world, which is filled with excitement and discoveries!

Little Shrimp Team

name: Little Shrimp：Legend Reborn

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows7
  • Processor: i3-5302.93GHZ2Core
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NvidiaGPUGeForceGTX750Ti2GB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectXcompatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Little Shrimp：Legend Reborn is a captivating Wuxia idle RPG that offers an open-world concept and an engaging storyline. With its free exploration of the Jianghu, leisurely gameplay, and auto-leveling fun, you'll have a blast with high levels of character involvement.
supported_languages:
English, Traditional Chinese*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
